TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataFormula extends System.Object

summary.span: Provides properties and methods to prepare series data for technical analysis, apply formulas on the series data and prepare output data to be displayed as a chart.

span.span: Provides properties and methods to prepare series data for technical analysis, apply formulas on the series data and prepare output data to be displayed as a chart.

summary.span: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether empty points are ignored while performing calculations.

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether empty points are ignored while performing calculations.

value.span: Si les points vides sont ignorés .

span.span: if empty points are ignored, otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Retourne la valeur `true`, points vides sont ignorés lors des calculs.Returns value is `true`, empty points are ignored during calculations. Dans le cas contraire, les points vides sont traités comme des zéros.Otherwise, empty points are treated as zeroes.
